name: hitpoints
description: HitPoints aims to be a food-tracker, video game style.

scripts.start:vue: npm run docker && docker compose up ui-vue -d
scripts.start:react: npm run docker && docker compose up ui-react -d
scripts.start:react-native: npm run docker && docker compose up api-express -d
scripts.docker: docker compose down && docker compose build --no-cache

author: Michael Lee <bmichaellee@outlook.com>
